Section.Catchline: Filing, license, statement, and miscellaneous fees.

Subsection.Text: Every legal expense insurance corporation must pay to the office the following fees:

Paragraph.Text: Certificate of authority of legal expense insurance corporation. Filing application for original certificate of authority, including all accompanying documents, filing fee$250
Annual license fee for legal expense insurance corporations$300
Statements of legal expense insurance corporation:

Subsection.Text: For any service not described in subsection (1), the fee is that prescribed in s. 624.501.
